issue.title: [Wiki] Guide for using CLion to debug C++ unit tests
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3118](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3118). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I saw that Impala has this guide:

https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/IMPALA/IntelliJ+and+CLion+Setup+for+Impala+Development

It would be useful to have such a guide oriented toward Arrow C++ developers

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3118?focusedCommentId=16669070) by Paddy Horan (paddyhoran):*
`[~wesmckinn]` I use Clion for rust development and I finally setup CLion to build the CPP code in debug mode so I could get better navigation, etc. when reading the CPP code.

I can add what worked for me to the wiki if it's helpful (not sure if I have access though).

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3118?focusedCommentId=16671549) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
If you let me know your Confluence ID we can give you edit access

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3118?focusedCommentId=16671613) by Paddy Horan (paddyhoran):*
ID is paddyhoran.  What I know is pretty basic but at least it's a start and others in the know on CPP can add to it.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3118?focusedCommentId=16672995) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
OK, you should be able to edit the wiki now
